# label

**Type Property**

The color for text labels that contain primary content.

## Declaration

```swift
class var label: UIColor { get }
```

## Label colors

- **secondaryLabel**: The color for text labels that contain secondary content.
- **tertiaryLabel**: The color for text labels that contain tertiary content.
- **quaternaryLabel**: The color for text labels that contain quaternary content.

items.description: The color for text labels that contain secondary content.
items.name: secondaryLabel

items.description: The color for text labels that contain tertiary content.
